query.name: select_account_stats
query.sql: SELECT (SELECT count(&pb_accounts;.id) FROM &pb_accounts;) as account_stats, (SELECT count(&pb_entries;.entry_id)FROM &pb_entries; WHERE &pb_entries;.status !=9) as entry_stats, (SELECT count(&pb_entry_amounts;.entry_amount_id) FROM &pb_entry_amounts;) as entry_amounts_stats, (SELECT count(&pb_general_ledger;.transaction_id) FROM &pb_general_ledger; WHERE &pb_general_ledger;.entry_amount IS NOT NULL AND &pb_general_ledger;.entry_amount!='0') as gl_stats
